0.text: Bug 19458  [Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems.

1.text: clean f2:  create a single project, say 'test'.

3.text: on the 'copy project' dialog:  1. with use default location checked, i should still be able to select to view  or copy the default location from the edit box below.

4.text: 2. if i uncheck the default location checkbox, the default location should  remain in the edit box (it should not clear it).

5.text: perhaps i want to choose a  path close to the default location.

6.text: 3. choose the project name to be 'test'.

7.text: notice that a static text validation error appears on the dialog.

9.text: it should be black text, and include the standard on-the-fly  validation small error icon.
